title: Functional Values Table
text: The functional values are shown in the table. Observe that for values of $$x$$ greater than $$2$$, we use $$f(x)=x^2-4$$. The values in this table were obtained using a calculator and using all the places given in the calculator output.\n##figure2.gif##

title: The Approaching Limit
text: As we read down the $$f(x)=x^2-4$$ column, what number are the values approaching?

title: Finding $$\lim_{x\to2} f(x)$$ from the right
text: Based on the table, we can conclude that /lim{x,2**+,f(x)}=0. The figure shows a graph of f(x) and reinforces our conclusion about the limit.\n##figure3.gif##
